prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon with a sleek, silver body and glowing eyes.
Imagine a legendary creature that embodies the power of creation with unique markings.
Generate a divine Pokemon that has elements of light and shadow in its design.
Show me a majestic Pokemon with a radiant aura and a celestial theme.
